item.title: Main Cargo Deck Crew Alerting System – Alternate Procedures Established and Used

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: The flight crew will ensure that there is a means to communicate with main cargo deck occupants.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN DECK CREW ALERTING SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
